LightningComponentBundle.description: Custom component implementing lightning-address-input to solve issues where you can not change the label names on the standard address component

property.name: addressLookupLabel
property.label: Address Lookup Label
property.description: The label for the address lookup field option. Only visible when show-address-lookup is set to true and label string is passed

property.name: addressLookupPlaceholder
property.label: Address Lookup Placeholder
property.description: The placeholder for the address lookup field option. Visible only when using show-address-lookup.

property.name: addressLabel
property.label: Address Label
property.description: The label for the address compound field.

property.name: streetLabel
property.label: Street Label
property.description: The label for the street field.

property.name: cityLabel
property.label: City Label
property.description: The label for the city field.

property.name: countryLabel
property.label: Country Label
property.description: The label for the country field.

property.name: provinceLabel
property.label: Province/State/County Label
property.description: The label for the province/state/county field.

property.name: postalCodeLabel
property.label: Postcode Label
property.description: The label for the postal code field.

property.name: streetValue
property.label: Street Value
property.description: The value for the street field. Maximum length is 255 characters when rendered as a textarea.

property.name: cityValue
property.label: City Value
property.description: The value for the city field. Maximum length is 40 characters.

property.name: countryValue
property.label: Country Value
property.description: The country field for the address. Maximum length is 80 characters.

property.name: provinceValue
property.label: Province/State/County Value
property.description: The province/state/county field for the address. Maximum length is 80 characters.

property.name: postalCodeValue
property.label: Postcode Value
property.description: The value for postal code field. Maximum length is 20 characters.

property.name: fieldLevelHelp
property.label: Field Level Help
property.description: Help text detailing the purpose and function of the input.

property.name: readOnly
property.label: Read Only
property.description: If present, the address fields are read-only and cannot be edited.

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: If present, the address fields must be filled before the form is submitted.

property.name: showAddressLookup
property.label: Show Address Lookup
property.description: If present, an address lookup field using Google Maps is displayed.

property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: The variant changes the appearance of an input address field. Accepted variants include standard, label-hidden, label-inline, and label-stacked.
